page.title: 19ENTERTAINMENT CONTINUED
page.content: Likewise with books,we enjoy adventure stories by Enid Blyton and Roald Dahl as well as classic stories by Anna Sewell,Louisa M.Alcott and C.S.Lewis. Our favourite pop stars(singers) are Wham!,Nik Kershaw,Sister Sledge,Paul Young and Duran Duran.Lots of pop stars have decided to help the famine victims in Africa,and have made a record,called Band Aid,to raise money.In addition to this,on July 13th 1985,there was a mammoth pop festival,LIVE AID,which lasted for 16 hours split between Wembley,London and J.F.K.Stadium,Philadelphia.This raised around 45 million pounds which will be used to buy food and longer term aid for the starving people in Africa.
